TextView.android:text: You have different options for how to manage a miscarriage. Some people prefer to manage their own miscarriages at home, while others prefer to work with a health care provider. Here are some options for treating your miscarriage: Watch and wait: You can wait for a miscarriage to happen on itâ€™s own. Many people choose this as their first option. If you feel like this is taking too long, you can discuss one of the other options below with a health care provider. Surgical treatment/suction procedure: You can ask a health care provider to remove the pregnancy using an in-office procedure. Medication: You can ask a healthcare provider if you can use pills to make the miscarriage happen sooner. Source: American Family Physician
